p:
To evaluate the antioxidant properties of plant extracts, the DPPH assay
31 was performed. Due to the sensitivity of this test to acid and basic pH values
32 , it was verified that the pH of extracts ranged from 4 to 8. Values obtained from unripe and ripe fruit extracts were compared with the extracts of the control species V. myrtillus. Moreover, the Folin-Ciocalteu assay
33 was also performed to verify whether the antioxidant activity of the extracts couldÂ be related to the presence of polyphenols. Results of the DPPH and Folin-Ciocalteau assays were expressed as Trolox and gallic acid (GA) equivalents respectively, by means of calibration curves.
